author: , Hornell Evening Tribune
title: Sun, warm temps in forecast for Saturday Maple City Fall Festival. What to expect downtown
text: What a difference a year makes when it comes to the Maple City Fall Festival. After soggy, chilly conditions kept down festival crowds and challenged vendors in 2023, the forecast for Saturday's fifth edition of the autumn shindig couldn't be better. Look for a mix of sun and clouds, afternoon temperatures in the low to mid 60s and almost no threat of rain on Saturday in Hornell, according AccuWeather . If that weather outlook holds true, it should make for a bustling scene in downtown Hornell, where the event takes place from noon to 6 p.m. There will be all the things you expect at a fall festival, including food trucks, dozens of food and craft vendors, games, free activities for children and families, and live music. Hornell Partners for Growth , which sponsors the festival, said the event has grown each year and Saturday's participation should be the most robust yet. In addition to places to buy stuff, many community groups and organizations will have a presence on Main Street, sharing information about their causes and how to get involved. "Through events like the Maple City Fall Festival, we strive to bring the community together and celebrate all that makes Hornell a great place to live and work," said Valorie Whitehill, HPG executive director. "I am extremely grateful for the support of many local businesses and individuals who provided sponsorships to make the 5th annual Maple City Fall Festival happen," she added. The 2024 festival has benefited from some good fortune already. For much of the year, the festival wasn't on the schedule because it appeared unfeasible while Hornell's $2.9 million streetscape project was in progress . But organizers said the construction project moved along faster than expected, and HPG announced in August that the festival would take place after all. Making plans to be in Hornell Saturday? Here are a couple more things to know before you go. More: 'Sinister' Andover Haunted House has 'over the top' scares in its 27th year. What to know. Live music lineup for Maple City Fall Festival Grab something to eat from a festival food stand or at one of the several Main Street restaurants that will be open on Saturday, find a seat and enjoy the performances. Here are the bands and when they will be on stage. - Noon to 2 p.m., “The Situation.” - 3 to 6 p.m., “Edge of OATKA.” Fall Festival HAT Alfred Shuttle HPG said the HAT will operate a free shuttle between Alfred and Hornell during the festival. Full list of vendors, updates available from HPG For festival updates, download the Discover Hornell App. Want to know what you will find downtown? Visit HPG online, where there is an updated list of the nearly 100 vendors slated to be at the event. Email Neal Simon at nsimon@gannett.com. To get unlimited access to the latest news, please subscribe or activate your digital account today.

author: Matías Vallés
title: En los hoteles mallorquines no se come bien
text:
En los hoteles mallorquines no se come bien
En esta semana de merecidos reconocimientos a Pere Sampol, procede refrescar otra frase pronunciada en el Parlament, y pertinente en la negociación del convenio de hostelería. El líder nacionalista concluía resignado que «ya que en Mallorca nos prostituimos, que sea por lo menos a un precio elevado». Esta impecable definición del ‘prostiturismo’ denunciaba que los entusiastas de vender barato el cuerpo de la isla eran los propios hoteleros. Hasta que aprendieron, y lo suyo les costó, que la regla de tres (estrellas) era mucho menos rentable que la de cinco.
Los empresarios dispararon los precios a 500 euros por noche de cuatro estrellas o mil de lujo, pero se olvidaron de repercutir sus beneficios pantagruélicos en los trabajadores. Solo hay algo más miserable que un sueldo de hostelería, la ecotasa que paga el turista por gentileza de Vox/PP. La avaricia del sector repercute en una faceta esencial del servicio, porque en los hoteles mallorquines no se come bien. No solo en el inevitable menú en polvo de tres estrellas, sino sobre todo en la escala superior. Admitamos que este juicio es fácil de invertir, sin más que convidar gratis total al estómago agradecido que va a emitirlo.
Durante miles de horas de estancias en hoteles mallorquines, nunca he visto al propietario en sus dependencias, porque debe estar contando billetes en el sótano, y solo he divisado episódicamente al director. De ahí que les cueste apreciar que sus menús no están a la altura, por mucho que los turistas tengan acreditada su disposición a tragarse cualquier cosa con tal de pisar suelo mallorquín.
¿Por qué no se come bien en los hoteles de la isla? Porque los hoteleros regatean en los sueldos, que permitirían formar y contratar a trabajadores de calidad, sin llegar al desvarío de los chefs vascos que perciben 300 mil euros anuales por ceder su nombre a un restaurante, que lógicamente quiebra en el empeño.
Los datos son irrefutables. Son Sant Joan es el aeropuerto con mayor tráfico de jets privados de Europa, solo en competencia con Ibiza. En contraste con este flujo de billonarios hambrientos, Mallorca carece de un solo restaurante con tres estrellas Michelin, por siete en la Costa Azul. La isla solo ofrece uno de dos, con otra decena de estrellas solitarias desperdigadas. La décima parte que el vecino francés, la calidad hay que pagarla en sueldos a la altura.

author: David
title: New Covenant Church Scottburgh: A Masterpiece Of Architecture
text:
20111218_123201 New Covenant Church from nccglencarbon.org Step into the New Covenant Church in Scottburgh and you will feel like you have stumbled upon a hidden architectural gem. The stunning structure is a testament to the ingenuity and creativity that can be achieved with the combination of modern and traditional building techniques.
As you approach the church, the first thing that catches your eye is the intricate stonework that adorns the façade. The combination of different shades of stone gives the building a unique texture and depth that is rarely seen in modern architecture. The use of stone also harks back to the traditional building styles of the area, creating a sense of continuity between the old and the new.
But the real magic of the New Covenant Church lies in its interior. As you step through the doors, you are transported into a world of light and space. The vaulted ceilings soar above you, creating an almost ethereal atmosphere. The use of natural light is masterful, with the large windows and skylights allowing the sun to stream in and illuminate the space. The result is a space that feels both expansive and intimate, making it the perfect place for worship and contemplation.
Table of Contents
The Bell Tower: A Modern Twist on an Old Classic The Atrium: A Space for Community The Sanctuary: A Space for Reflection The Gardens: A Place of Tranquility The Importance of Architecture in Creating a Sense of Community The Bell Tower: A Modern Twist on an Old Classic The bell tower of the New Covenant Church is a true masterpiece of modern architecture. The tower is a three-story structure that is both elegant and functional. The lower level houses the bell, which is rung to announce the start of services. But it’s the upper levels that really catch the eye. The tower is clad in a shimmering metal mesh that reflects the sunlight, creating a stunning visual effect. The mesh also acts as a veil, allowing the bell tower to blend seamlessly into the surrounding landscape. It’s a modern twist on an old classic that works in perfect harmony with the rest of the building.
The Atrium: A Space for Community One of the most impressive spaces in the New Covenant Church is the atrium. This large, open space is designed to be a gathering place for the community. The high ceilings and large windows create a feeling of space and light, while the use of natural materials such as wood and stone gives the space a warm, welcoming feel. The atrium is designed to be a space for people to come together, whether it’s for coffee after a service or for a community event. It’s a place where people can connect and feel a sense of belonging.
The Sanctuary: A Space for Reflection The sanctuary of the New Covenant Church is a space that is designed to inspire reflection and contemplation. The vaulted ceilings and skylights give the space an almost cathedral-like feel, while the use of natural materials such as stone and wood creates a sense of warmth and comfort. The focal point of the space is the altar, which is bathed in natural light from the large windows behind it. The space is designed to be both grand and intimate, creating the perfect atmosphere for worship and prayer.
The Gardens: A Place of Tranquility The gardens surrounding the New Covenant Church are a testament to the power of nature to inspire and uplift the human spirit. The gardens are designed to be a place of tranquility and reflection, where people can escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life and connect with the natural world. The gardens are filled with native plants and flowers, creating a sense of harmony between the built environment and the natural world. The result is a space that is both beautiful and calming, the perfect place to find solace and peace.
The Importance of Architecture in Creating a Sense of Community The New Covenant Church in Scottburgh is a masterful example of how architecture can be used to create a sense of community and belonging. The use of natural materials, the clever use of light, and the seamless integration of the building into the surrounding landscape all contribute to a sense of harmony and unity. The result is a space that inspires and uplifts the human spirit, a space where people can come together to worship, to connect, and to find peace.
Topik Sub Topik The Bell Tower A Modern Twist on an Old Classic The Atrium A Space for Community The Sanctuary A Space for Reflection The Gardens A Place of Tranquility
Source: www.pbsdesignbuild.com Source: www.themountaineer.com Source: globegazette.com Source: nccglencarbon.org Source: www.iheart.com Source: newcovenantspearfish.com Source: ncccfd.org Source: www.youtube.com Source: vimeo.com Source: waydemichael-davy-vsgl.squarespace.com Source: vimeo.com Source: www.primacoustic.com Source: www.newcovenantincameron.com

author: Олег Царёв
title: Олег Царёв: 52 украинских БПЛА ночью перехвачено/уничтожено российской ПВО над территорией России: 41- над Белгородской, 6 - над Брянской обл, 3 - над Московским регионом, 2 - над Крымом - Лента новостей Крыма
text:
52 украинских БПЛА ночью перехвачено/уничтожено российской ПВО над территорией России: 41– над Белгородской, 6 – над Брянской обл, 3 – над Московским регионом, 2 – над Крымом.
В Белгородской обл утром FPV-дрон атаковал легковой автомобиль, ранен мужчина. Повреждены ЛЭП, сожжены ГАЗели, частные дома.
В Брянской обл атакой дронов ранены два мирных жителя, ещё один — в Курской обл.
Под массированным ударом дронов была Херсонская обл: есть раненые, не утихают лесные пожары.
В Запорожской обл без электроснабжения остался Акимовский округ.
По ДНР противник выпустил 24 боеприпаса, ранены четыре мирных жителя (на видео – небо Горловки).

author: Bastian Küsel
title: Moderatorin Nova Meierhenrich nimmt immer weiter zu: Diese Krankheit ist schuld
text:
Moderatorin nimmt immer weiter zu: Diese Krankheit ist schuld
Hamburg - Offene Worte von Nova Meierhenrich (51): Die Moderatorin hat sich am Mittwoch mit einem beunruhigenden Statement bei ihren Fans auf Instagram gemeldet.
Auf den ersten Blick versprühten die beiden Bikini-Bilder, die die Wahl-Hamburgerin auf ihrem Profil veröffentlichte, pure Lebensfreude: An einem unbekannten Strand steht Nova im knietiefen Wasser und strahlt mit der Sonne um die Wette.
Doch die Bilder gehören der Vergangenheit an: "Zwei Jahre sind diese Bilder alt und seitdem hat mein Körper sich ganz schön verändert", erklärte die Schauspielerin in einem längeren Text unter den Schnappschüssen.
Erst habe sie die Veränderungen auf alles Mögliche geschoben: "Beginnende Wechseljahre, Hormonchaos, viel unterwegs, wenig Schlaf (...). Aber wenn einfach gar kein Lieblingskleid mehr passt, verzweifelt man irgendwann", verdeutlichte die 51-Jährige.
Also habe sie auf ihre Ernährung geachtet, Zucker vermieden und nur noch Wasser getrunken - ohne Erfolg! "Trotzdem ging die Waage immer weiter nach oben. Frust!", unterstrich die Moderatorin.
Nova Meierhenrich klärt auf Instagram über ihre Gewichtszunahme auf
Nova Meierhenrich leidet an einer gefährlichen Insulinresistenz
Irgendwann sei ihrer Ärztin ein Verdacht gekommen, der sich in der vergangenen Woche bestätigt habe: Nova leidet an einer Insulinresistenz. Das bedeutet, dass ihre Zellen kaum bis gar keine Glukose mehr aus dem Blut aufnehmen, was langfristig zu einer Typ-2-Diabetes-Erkrankung führen kann.
"Einerseits bin ich so froh, jetzt eine Erklärung zu haben. Ich hatte keine Chance. Andererseits stehen große Veränderungen ins Haus. Neuer Ernährungsplan, Verzicht auf jegliche Kohlenhydrate (ich werde eingehen) und natürlich Medikamente", betonte die Blondine.
Gleichzeitig habe sie durch die nun feststehende Diagnose die Hoffnung, im kommenden Sommer ihren Wohlfühlkörper zurückzuhaben. Ihre Fans wird sie bei diesem Vorhaben bestimmt auf dem Laufenden halten ...
Titelfoto: Fotomontage: Instagram/nova_meierhenrich

author: Sixtine Boyer
title: VIDÉO. "Le calme, le soleil, la neige, ma famille, il ne manque rien !", balade et pique-nique, ils profitent de la neige sur les hauteurs du Languedoc
text:
Au nord de Béziers (Hérault), 60 centimètres de neige sont tombés pour le bonheur de tous les héraultais... ou presque. Luge, randonnée ou pique-nique, ce week-end, chacun en profitait à sa manière.
"Il a neigé dans l'aube rose", contait Maurice Carême. Et cette même neige a surpris le nord de l'Hérault qui s'est retrouvé enseveli sous 60 centimètres de flocons blancs, ce jeudi 11 janvier 2024.
Dans l'arrière-pays héraultais, ce doux manteau blanc fait le bonheur des plus sportifs.
Un randonneur se lance pour huit kilomètres d'ascension du Mont Caroux tandis qu'un couple s'essaie au vélo... malgré les glissades.
Calme, soleil et neige : trio gagnant Certains préfèrent fuir le monde et éviter les stations de ski, à la recherche du calme. C'est ce que vient trouver cette petite famille héraultaise à Rosis.
C'est le top, le paradis, le calme, le soleil, la neige, ma famille, c'est parfait, il ne manque rien !
Héraultaise
Au programme luge et déjeuner au soleil, une façon de bien commencer le week-end, en famille !
Déneigement en cours Même si les épisodes neigeux surprennent les populations sur les hauteurs du Languedoc, il faut réagir vite pour ne pas que cela devienne une source de déconvenues.
Les forestiers s'attellent à rouvrir les routes en dégageant la neige à l'aide de leur chasse-neige.
☃️Le déneigement continu dans les hauts cantons
❄️Vendredi 12 janvier, en direct de Castanet-le-haut, près de Rosis, les forestiers-sapeurs du Département, réouvrent les voies en dégageant les arbres et coupant les branches afin d'ouvrir la route au chasse-neige. pic.twitter.com/R4GgTFKxo1
— Département de l'Hérault (@Heraultinfos) January 12, 2024 Pourtant, certains ne profitent pas de ces efforts. Sur plus de 200 mètres, la route d'accès à la maison d'Anne-Laure est impraticable, elle ne peut pas aller faire ses courses en voiture.
Alors au lieu d'un bonhomme de neige, elle écrit "SOS" dans la neige afin qu'on vienne l'aider.
Écrit avec Camille Thomaso.

author: O Dia
title: Homem é preso por importunação sexual em ônibus, em Volta Redonda | Volta Redonda | O Dia
text: Após alerta de passageira, motorista parou ônibus em frente à 93a DP (Volta Redonda) e policiais prenderam agressorReprodução/93a DP De acordo com as informações da Polícia Civil, o crime ocorreu com o ônibus em movimento, quando o preso se masturbou e ejaculou no braço da passageira, além de passar a mão algumas vezes na perna da mulher. De acordo com o relato da vítima, o homem utilizou uma mochila para esconder o ato dos demais passageiros. Ela imediatamente começou a gritar para o motorista do coletivo, que parou o veículo e acionou os policiais civis, que rapidamente prenderam o autor. Após a prisão, o suspeito foi conduzido à 93a DP para prestar depoimento. A vítima, visivelmente abalada, foi ouvida pela autoridade policial e encaminhada para atendimento psicológico. O preso foi recolhido ao sistema penitenciário, onde permanecerá acautelado e a disposição da Justiça. A Polícia Civil destacou a importância de denunciar esse tipo de crime imediatamente, já que uma resposta rápida das autoridades é fundamental para a captura do suspeito e para garantir a segurança das demais pessoas no transporte público. “A Polícia Civil de Volta Redonda combaterá diuturnamente crimes sexuais, aumentando assim a sensação de segurança da população, principalmente em locais de grande circulação, como ônibus e outros meios de transporte coletivo. As investigações continuarão para apurar se o suspeito já esteve envolvido em outros casos semelhantes. As autoridades também reforçam a necessidade de campanhas de conscientização para que as pessoas saibam identificar e denunciar casos de importunação sexual”, comunicou a Polícia Civil, lembrando ainda que existe um Whatsapp da 93a DP para denúncias: (24) 3339-2462. Homem de 22 anos é preso por importunação sexual, em Volta Redonda, após ejacular no braço de passageira, de 33 anos. O agressor foi preso em flagrante, dentro do ônibus, por policiais da 93a DP (Volta Redonda), na Av. Lucas Evangelista, Aterrado.— Jornal O Dia (@jornalodia) Crédito: 93a DP/PCERJ [pic.twitter.com/K2kflusD07] [August 8, 2024] Os comentários não representam a opinião do jornal e são de responsabilidade do autor. [ Volta Redonda ](/volta-redonda/2024/08/6896779-homem-e-preso-por-importunacao-sexual-em-onibus-em-volta-redonda.html) Homem é preso por importunação sexual em ônibus, em Volta Redonda Preso em flagrante por policiais da 93a DP (Volta Redonda), homem de 22 anos ejaculou no braço de passageira [ Volta Redonda ](/volta-redonda/2024/08/6896647-volta-redonda-e-a-unica-cidade-do-estado-que-recebera-recursos-federais-para-capacitacao-de-jovens.html) Volta Redonda é a única cidade do estado que receberá recursos federais para capacitação de jovens Programa Estação Juventude, do Governo Federal, irá contemplar 20 municípios de todo o Brasil [ Volta Redonda ](/volta-redonda/2024/08/6896639-secretaria-de-obras-trabalha-na-prevencao-com-desobstrucao-de-bueiros.html) Secretaria de Obras trabalha na prevenção com desobstrução de bueiros Nesta quarta-feira, serviço foi realizado no bairro Vila Mury; limpeza do sistema pluvial é realizada durante todo o ano [ Volta Redonda ](/volta-redonda/2024/08/6896619-volta-redonda-vai-desenvolver-projeto-de-orquestra-com-musicos-autistas.html) Volta Redonda vai desenvolver projeto de orquestra com músicos autistas Iniciativa foi discutida nesta quinta-feira no Palácio 17 de Julho com o idealizador e organizador do Rio Cello [ Volta Redonda ](/volta-redonda/2024/08/6896466-etapa-de-agosto-do-programa-revi-ver-vai-fazer-mais-540-cirurgias-de-catarata-em-volta-redonda.html) Etapa de agosto do programa ‘Revi-VER’ vai fazer mais 540 cirurgias de catarata em Volta Redonda Mutirão na Ilha São João também prevê 160 cirurgias de pterígio, 600 biometrias, 200 procedimentos YAG Laser e 250 consultas [ Volta Redonda ](/volta-redonda/2024/08/6896446-forcas-de-seguranca-de-volta-redonda-intensificarao-repressao-a-roubos-de-rua-veiculos-e-furtos.html) Forças de segurança de Volta Redonda intensificarão repressão a roubos de rua, veículos e furtos Reunião promovida pela Secretaria de Ordem Pública debateu melhorias no planejamento operacional

author: Vatican News
title: Cardinal Bo prays for priest brutally killed in Myanmar, appeals for end to violence
text:
Cardinal Bo prays for priest brutally killed in Myanmar, appeals for end to violence
By Deborah Castellano Lubov
"May the blood and sacrifices of countless innocent people, along with Father Donald Martin Ye Naing Win, serve as an offering to ending the violence that is occurring throughout the Nation."
Cardinal Charles Maung Bo, the President of Myanmar's Bishops' Conference, expressed this in a message on condolences he sent for the death of Father Donald Martin Ye Naing Win, who was killed by an armed group as the conflict persists between Myanmar’s military and resistance forces.
Earlier this month, Myanmar's military junta bombed the Sacred Heart of Jesus Catholic Church in Mindat, a locality in Burma's northwestern Chin State. It was the church chosen as the cathedral of the newly-established diocese of Mindat, which Pope Francis had created on 25 January.
The new cathedral, hit on 6 February, was rendered unusable after aerial bombardments damaged its roof and stained glass windows. There were no injuries in the bombing, because the priests and faithful had already left the area due to the poor security conditions and the ongoing fighting.
'Earnest appeal to end the violence'
In his note of condolences for Father Donald, Cardinal Bo states, "We received the news that Father Donald Martin Ye Naing Win, a priest of the Catholic Archdiocese of Mandalay, was brutally murdered by a group of armed men on the evening of Friday, February 14, 2025. We are deeply shocked and saddened by the news.
The Catholic Church throughout Myanmar, together with Mandalay's Archbishop Marco Tin Win, the priests, the religious, the faithful of the Archdiocese of Mandalay and the late Burmese priest's parents and relatives, the head of the Church in Myanmar acknowledged, are mourning his loss.
"May God the Father, the Lord of all life," Cardinal Bo prayed, "comfort your mourning hearts and ours."
"Learning from these heartbreaking experiences that we have encountered," he implored, "may the fraternal spirit be awakened, and we earnestly appeal for an end to the violence."
Preventing such incidents in the future
The wrongdoing committed against Father Donald Martin Ye Naing Win, Cardinal Bo insisted, is not something that can be easily forgotten.
"Therefore," he stressed, "we urge those responsible to take appropriate action and ensure justice is served, so that such incidents do not occur again in the future."
"May the soul of Father Donald Martin Ye Naing Win through the mercy of God," he concluded, "rest in eternal peace!"
Strong condemnation of every attack
In addition to Cardinal Bo's condolences, the Apostolic Nunciature in Myanmar also expressed its despair over the priest's killing, reported LiCAS.news.
The Chargé d’Affaires of the Nunciature, Msgr. Andrea Ferrante, expressed his "profound sadness" and "strongly condemned every attack on life and human dignity" and "all forms of violence as a means of resolving conflicts.”
The diplomat urged priests, religious, and missionaries in the Archdiocese, despite the dangers, to stand firm in their mission.
“Rooted in His love," Msgr. Ferrante encouraged, "may each one be a sign of the merciful presence of the Father who welcomes His children and heals their wounds,” he added.
Thank you for reading our article. You can keep up-to-date by subscribing to our daily newsletter. Just click here
